San_Rafael.The Village at Corte Madera:
The Village at Corte Madera is an upscale lifestyle center located in Corte Madera, California. It opened in September 1985 with department stores Macy's and Nordstrom, and is owned and operated by Macerich.


== History ==
The Village at Corte Madera was developed by The Hahn Company and opened in September 1985, anchored by a 116,000 square foot Nordstrom and a 110,000 square foot Macy's.
